Pallantus and Eudora a tragœdie / written by Mr. Henry Killigrew. Conspiracy Killigrew, Henry, 1613-1700.
[4], 64 p.
Printed for Iohn Hardesty ..., London : 1653.
In verse. An unauthorized edition appeared in 1638 under title: The conspiracy : a tragedy as it was intended for the nuptialls of the Lord Charles Herbert, and the Lady Villers ... Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
=======
